name: Celebrity Foot Spa - Monster Nail Design by "Fun Free Kids Games"
name_original: Celebrity Foot Spa - Monster Nail Design by "Fun Free Kids Games"
description:
NEW - HOT - FREE FUN!

Spooky Foot Spa Services - Even monsters need to get their glam on!

Realistic features brings this app to life...
-Soak, Scrub and Rinse
-Moisturize
-Clip and File
-Ready to Polish - with tons of color choices you can't go wrong.
-Accessorizing is your final step - loads of fun and unique items like toe rings and ankle bracelets.

Have fun and get creative! Don't forget to share with your friends via facebook, twitter or email.

*******************************
= FREE APP TODAY
******************************

Check out the screenshots and see for yourself, you won't be disappointed!
